title: Princess Lover! OVA
synopsis: After his parents are killed in an accident, Teppei Kobayashi is adopted by his grandfather, Isshin Arima. After taking his grandfather's name, Teppei is made the heir to the Arima Financial Combine, one of the leading forces in the Japanese industry. As befits the heir to an industrial empire, he is enrolled in one of Japan's most prestigious international schools.
related_anime: ['Princess Lover! Sylvia van Hossen no Koiji', 'Princess Lover!']
